main.heroTitle: WE WILL CREATE A WEBSITE FOR YOUR BUSINESS
main.heroSubtitle: Fill out the form and get a free marketing audit of your business

how.MissionSub: Shaping the future in web development,
how.Stat2desc: Days to develop a landing page
how.Stat3desc: Expertise in digital marketing, web development, UX/UI design

card1.title: We develop websites that solve business problems

card2.title: We help discover extra solutions for your business

card4.title: Personalized approach
card4.desc: we create solutions tailored to your needs

stepper.title: From idea to launch
stepper.desc1: We'll discuss your project in 15 minutes:
stepper.desc3: Choose a convenient time for a call.

step1.title: You submit a request on the website
step1.desc: we don’t create websites just for the sake of it

step2.title: Introduction
step2.desc: We call via Zoom — short, to the point. Discuss your goals and fill out a brief to better understand your needs

step3.title: Proposal
step3.desc: We prepare a clear commercial offer with price, deadlines, and stages. Transparent and clear at first glance

step4.title: Start
step4.desc: We approve the technical task and get to work! You see the process, we stay in touch

step5.title: Launch
step5.desc: The site is ready! But that’s not all: we conduct an audit, give recommendations, and stay with you post-launch
